confirmation.message_1: We have sent a confirmation link to the next email:
confirmation.message_2: Please check your email and click on the link to confirm your account.
confirmation.message_3: If you have not received the email, click on the button to resend the confirmation email.
confirmation.title: Confirm your email

new-password.message: Enter your new password and confirm it to change your password.
new-password.title: New password

reset.message: To reset your password, enter the email with which you registered and we will send you an email with the instructions.
reset.title: Reset your password

reset-sent.message_1: Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.
reset-sent.message_2: If you have not received the email, click on the button to resend the email.
reset-sent.title: Email sent

resetted.message: Your password has been changed successfully. Now you can login with your new password.
resetted.title: Password changed
